pong.swing
Class KeyEventListener

java.lang.Object
  pong.swing.KeyEventListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.KeyEventDispatcher
public class KeyEventListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.KeyEventDispatcher

The KeyEventListener class, implementing the KeyEventDispatcher interface, which handles the incoming key events and encapsulates the current keyboard state in an KeyState object

          Creates a new KeyEventListener
